name: mapping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity or process of making a map: the mapping of underground sites A GPS device uses mapping software to help drivers navigate. a polar mapping expedition
the activity or process of creating a picture or diagram that represents something: data mapping the mapping of supply chains
biology
  specialized the activity of describing where particular genes are found on a chromosome: genetic mapping the mapping of the human genome
biology
  specialized the activity of discovering where in the brain particular tasks are performed: brain/neurological mapping
